About Me

I am a Marketing professional with over 8 years of experience in Branding, Digital & Traditional Marketing, and Project Management, as well as extensive Video Production experience. I have proven success in developing and implementing promotional campaigns for both a global audience and locally within my hometown of Vancouver, BC Canada. I am a native speaker in both English and Cantonese-Chinese, and can also speak Japanese at an advanced level, holding a JLPT N2 certification. I am adept in a number of core applications in Adobe Creative Suite, namely Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere Pro, AfterEffects, and also have experience using Dreamweaver and Muse. Digital marketing and management tools that power my work include Google Analytics, Google Ads, Hubspot, Apollo, Ahrefs, Hootsuite, ClickUp, and Jira.

I enjoy competitive sports and outdoor activities, and have played in recreational hockey and multi-sport leagues, competed in dragon boat races, and participated in road running events.
